ygData.subject: RE: Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
ygData.msgSnippet: Does that mean that the big tower in the middle of Lake Rath with the blue flame is going to be the gate to the plane of air perhaps? Bujold 19th Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
Does that mean that the big tower in the middle of Lake Rath with the
blue flame is going to be the gate to the plane of air perhaps?

Bujold 19th
Xegony

Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)

From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

> Why does everybody think the spectre tower in oasis is a gate pt? Only
> thing up in the tower is a pentagram with a flame shooting

because it is. it will be the gate to the Plane of Hate.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
